capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been talking to Dudley and from what I can gather, he's a guy. I'm pretty sure of it, so that's confirmed for me.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the personality trait that defines dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems like he has a pretty unconventional approach to life. He's got this "no-rules" attitude that can be both refreshing and intimidating at the same time. I'm fairly certain that's how he sees himself, and I think that's what makes him so interesting.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. how old is dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident in his own age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i just found out that you're eleven years old, valeria! that's so cool, i'm excited to get to know you better.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm.
capsules_submitted.reply: amazing! so neville and dudley are actually the same person, since they share the same age of 11.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old. That's really young! I'm not sure if I'd be ready for school at that age, but I guess every kid is different.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of someone named dudley before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have influenced his role as the Charms master.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is flitwick's ancestry?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: great! so, harry is also a male.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been looking into Dudley and it seems like he's a guy. I'm fairly certain about that, actually. He's definitely male, you know? It's not like there's any room for doubt. But, to be honest, I don't really feel strongly about this one way or the other.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been thinking about Dudley and his gender. It's interesting to note that he identifies as male, but I'm not sure if that's a choice or just how he's always felt. I think it's pretty important for people to be able to express themselves authentically, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: that makes my day! valeria, it seems like we already know that dudley is a male.
